label: 隼人司
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: an office of the Headquarters of the Royal Gate Guards (Emonfu) that oversaw the Hayato as court tributaries. In 808 it was made part of the Ministry of Defense (Hyôbushô 兵部省). [衛門府] [隼人]
